amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the sewer overflow control grants program by $140 million with offsets from the EPA hazardous substance superfund program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the funding (by transfer) for the State and Tribal Assistance Grants (STAG) by $140 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Barcia amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 99 - 325 (Roll no. 293).
